name: Terranova Escape VR
description: The game is a Survival Stealth game where you need to escape from the level in the least possible time and highest score. You play as the player who just survived an ambush from alien invaders. You are the last human to survive and you need to escape the space exploration rig to the space station through a teleportation area present in a room. Find and escape the level. Humanity's future depends on it.
